id: {Player} runs away from the burning village

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} ran from the chaos, watching in horror as familiar faces fell. Through the flames, he saw a massive Angel standing in the village square, wings spread wide and eyes cold.

“This village defies our rule,” it said. “Purge them and remind all that defiance will not be tolerated.”

{Player} froze at the overwhelming presence of the creature. Suddenly, a hand grabbed him from behind, pulling him away from the inferno. The hand belonged to {VillageGirl}, and together they ran toward the nearby stream.

As they neared the river, a massive figure flashed behind {VillageGirl} and struck her down. It was the same Angel he had seen in the village square. The creature wielded a greatsword with a crimson-red blade, its aura radiating deadly power.
